purpose: The email announces the opening of applications for the 2025 Summer School on Informatics Education Research (SCHIER), which is the only summer school in Europe focused on this field. It provides details about the event, including the dates, location, target audience, and registration fees. The email emphasizes the benefits of attending, such as expert-led lectures, collaborative discussions, and networking opportunities. It also highlights the limited availability of spots and the application deadline.

evidence_sentences: Applications are now open for the 2025 Summer School on Informatics Education Research (SCHIER).
Who should attend: PhD students, postdocs, and researchers with an interest in Informatics Education Research
SCHIER 2025 offers a week of: - Expert-led lectures and interactive sessions on key topics and methodologies.
Applications are now open, limited to 40 participants on a first-come, first-served basis.
Basic registration fees: - EUR 350 for Participants from IE member institutes - EUR 400 for other participants
Don’t miss this unique opportunity to engage with a vibrant community of researchers shaping the future of Informatics Education in Europe!
